text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion specifically asks whether the answer states that if the main object of the GIP is the accomplishment of an economic and industrial public service (SPIC), its personnel is by default subject to private law. The candidate answer discusses the general possibility of private law employment in a GIP but fails to mention the specific legal default rule tied to the GIP's mission (SPIC vs. administrative/social public service) as required by the criterion.", "criterion_id": "e9f93b00-c174-4505-879b-532c4d69711a"}
